title: -27. Add Two Integers
description: Given two integers `num1` and `num2`, return *the **sum** of the two integers*.

examples.explanation: num1 is 12, num2 is 5, and their sum is 12 + 5 = 17, so 17 is returned.

functionSignatures.java: public int sum(int num1, int num2)
functionSignatures.python3: def sum(self, num1: int, num2: int) -> int
